summary.span: 获取或设置交替 对象的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating objects.
The number of alternating objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和 附加属性使你能够指定两个或更多个交替 对象的外观。The property and the attached property enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating objects. 例如，您可以为 中的每个第三个 指定交替的背景色。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third in an . 分配给 中的每个 。The is assigned to each in the . 从0开始，递增，直到 减1，然后重新从0开始。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果 为3，并且 中有七个 对象，下表将列出每个项的 。For example, if is 3 and there are seven objects in the , the following table lists the for each item. | 在 中的位置Position of in the || |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 可以使用几种方法为交替 对象指定不同的外观。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating objects. 一种方法是将 的 或 中的属性绑定到 。One method is to bind properties in the or of the to the . 然后，可以使用 来指定应将哪个值应用于具有特定 值的 。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the that has a certain value. 你还可以使用触发器来更改属性的值，具体取决于其 的值。You can also use triggers to change the value of a property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个绑定到对集合中的项进行分组的 的 。The following example creates a that is bound to a that groups the items in the collection. 该示例通过执行以下操作，替换两种颜色之间每个 标题的背景：The example alternates the background for the header of each between two colors by doing the following: - 将 设置为2。Sets to 2. - 根据 的值，创建返回 的 。Creates an that returns a , depending on the value of . - 将 中 的 绑定到 属性，并提供 。Binds the of the in the to the property and provides the . 请注意， 附加属性是在 上设置的，该绑定使用 获取其值。Note that the attached property is set on the , and the binding uses to get its value. 该示例还通过设置 上的 并将每个 的 绑定到 ， 在三种颜色之间替换项的背景。The example also alternates the background of the items in the between three colors by setting the on the and binding the of each to the . 在这种情况下，背景在三种颜色之间交替。In this case, the background alternates between three colors. 不显示对项进行分组的 。The that groups the items is not shown. 有关如何对项进行分组的详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 XAML 中使用视图对数据进行排序和分组](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For information on how to group item, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

span.span: The style that is applied to the generated for each item.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个很罕见的情况，在属性元素语法中创建 内联而不是将样式创建为资源是一种合理的替代方法。This property is a rare case where creating a inline in property element syntax, rather than creating the style as a resource, is a reasonable alternative methodology. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果标题显示为字符串，应如何设置该标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果标题显示为字符串，应如何设置该标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义的复合字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果设置了 的 或 属性，则会忽略 属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它按价格范围对项的集合进行分组。The following example creates a that groups a collection of items by price range. 转换器 `GroupByPrice`返回高于每个项的价格的整数值。The converter, `GroupByPrice`, returns an integer value that is above each item's price. 例如，如果项的价格介于0到100之间，则转换器将返回100。For example, if an item's price is between 0 and 100, the converter returns 100. 该示例使用 创建包含每个价格范围上限的字符串。The example uses the to create a string that includes the upper limit for each price range. 例如，在美国中，100美元下面的项将按标题显示，该标题显示 "项低于 $100"。For example, in the United States, items that are under 100 dollars are grouped under a heading that says "Items under $100". [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleHeaderStringFormat](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#groupstyleheaderstringformat)] 下面的示例演示了 `GroupByPrice` 类、`PurchaseItem` 类以及 绑定到的集合。The following example shows the `GroupByPrice` class, the `PurchaseItem` class, and the collection that the is bound to. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#groupstyledata)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#groupstyledata)]

[!code-xaml[GroupingSample#XAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml#xaml)] [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#Code](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#code)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#Code](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#code)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性：The following example shows how to use the property: [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#GroupStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#groupstyle)] 下面是 `groupingHeaderTemplate`的定义：The following is the definition of the `groupingHeaderTemplate`: [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#HeaderTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#headertemplate)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
